About

Hello! I'm Vikas Kumar Sahu, a passionate Web Developer and AI Enthusiast currently pursuing a B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering at IIITDM Kurnool, Andhra Pradesh. I have a strong foundation in web development and a deep interest in Artificial Intelligence, particularly in Machine Learning (ML), Deep Learning (DL), and Generative AI (GenAI). I have developed my problem-solving skills and refined my understanding of Data Structures and Algorithms over the years, which are core strengths of mine. I enjoy tackling complex challenges and continuously learning to improve my skills. With a goal to work alongside brilliant minds, I aim to contribute to society through innovative technology. My passion is not only in developing cutting-edge solutions but also in making a positive impact on the world around me. Outside of work, I enjoy exploring various philosophies from different cultures, which broadens my perspective and fuels my creativity. I also stay fit through regular workouts, which helps me maintain a balanced and focused mindset. I look forward to collaborating with talented individuals who share my passion for growth and making a difference.

Projects

(hover on content to view)

MIRAAT

MIRAAT (Arabic word which means "Mirror") is an AI-powered mental health assessment application designed to evaluate mental health using professional tests. It categorizes disorders using zero-shot classification techniques and offers personalized solutions to users using Artificial Intelligence. Additional features, such as a community section, aim to foster better mental health through shared support and interaction.

Skills Used:

  • HTML
  • TailwindCSS
  • Javascript
  • Python
  • PostgreSQL
  • FastAPI
  • Jinja2
  • Firebase
  • Hugging Face
  • Tensorflow

MIRAAT

2024

PERFORMANCE ANALYZER

Student Performance Analyzer is an end-to-end machine learning project designed to analyze and predict student performance using advanced industry-level techniques. It involves comprehensive exploratory data analysis (EDA), model training, and pipeline implementation. The project leverages algorithms such as Random Forest, AdaBoost, XGBoost, CatBoost, and others for accurate predictions and performance evaluation. Key features include the use of metrics like R² score, mean squared error, and mean absolute error for model validation. The application evaluates student performance based on features like gender, race/ethnicity, parental education level, lunch type, and test scores, providing actionable insights for improvement.

Skills Used:

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • Javascript
  • Python
  • Bootstrap
  • Flask
  • Jinja2
  • Scikit-learn
  • Numpy
  • Pandas

PERFOMANCE ANALYZER

2024

CLOTHSHOP

ClothShop is a comprehensive management system designed to streamline operations in a clothing store. It efficiently manages daily profit and loss, employee salaries, cash and online earnings, and inventory. By automating these tasks, ClothShop reduces manual errors, enhances operational efficiency, and provides insights to improve profitability and decision-making. Its user-friendly interface ensures easy adoption and smooth functionality for all users.

Skills Used:

  • Python
  • JSON
  • OOP
  • File Handling

CLOTHSHOP

2024

RAGENGINE

RAGENGINE is a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) application that answers questions based on uploaded documents. Users can upload PDF or DOCX files, ask context-specific questions, and receive accurate answers derived from the documents. The system employs efficient data retrieval techniques and features a user-friendly interface built with Streamlit, ensuring a seamless and intuitive experience. It streamlines knowledge extraction for various use cases, making document analysis faster and more efficient.

Skills Used:

  • Python
  • LlamaIndex
  • Streamlit
  • RAG
  • Vector Embeddings
  • Gemini

RAGENGINE

2024

TEXTEDITS

TextEdits is a text editing website built using the REACT framework to simplify editing long texts. It offers various functions, including converting text to lowercase, uppercase, and title case, removing extra spaces, copying text, clearing text, previewing content, counting words and characters, and estimating reading time. Additionally, it features light and dark modes, providing users with a customizable and comfortable editing experience. Its intuitive interface makes text editing efficient and user-friendly.

Skills Used:

  • HTML
  • Vanilla CSS
  • Javasript
  • ReactJS
  • Bootstrap

TEXTEDITS

2024
